channel.title: Fake Podcast
channel.description: Welcome to my completely fake podcast!
channel.itunes:author: Fake Dude

item.title: 001 Fake it 'till you make it
item.description: Learn how to fake it until you achieve some level of success or otherwise get fired. Lather, rinse, repeat.

item.title: 002 Fakery done right
item.description: If you are going to fake it, you gotta be good at it.

item.title: 003 Shake n' Fake
item.description:
What's the best recipe for expert fakery? Well, you have to start with some really fake ingredients and some gumption (sp?). In this episode, we will walk through the process of baking faking into any life endeavor.
Here's a shopping list: http://amazon.com http://walmart.com

item.title: 004 Alex Figueira - Serious
item.description: And now for a little free music. This is "Serious" by Alex Figueira, curtousy of the Free Music Archive: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/alex-figueira/mentallogenic/serious/

item.title: Trailer
item.description: This is a fake podcast. There's your trailer.
